item.title: Builds in Path of Exile
item.description: The Path of Exile forums provides a great starting point for the type of characters you would like to play.

item.title: Path of Building
item.description: Path of Building (PoB) is a tool that allows Path of Exile players to simulate the skill tree and in-game equipment to evaluate builds.

item.title: Loot Filters
item.description: Loot filters allow you to decrease the amount of items that appear on the ground for you to click. This increases in-game efficiency with less time spent looking at low-value items.

item.title: Trade Macros
item.description: Trade macros are external tools that allow players to check item values and trade for items with other players more easily.

item.title: Exilence Next
item.description: Exilence Next is an app that lets you track your income and net worth in Path of Exile based off the items in your stash.

item.title: Additional Resources
item.description: The main ‘tools’ section of this site covers the most common tools and resources available for new players. This section will point players towards more advanced or in-depth resources if they wish to dig deeper into Path of Exile!
